description.add: Add a song to the playlist
description.back: Go back to the previous song
description.stop: Stop playing and leave the channel
description.remove: Remove a song from the playlist
description.play_custom_list: Play a custom playlist, you can use /add_custom_list to add songs.
description.add_custom_list: Add songs to a custom playlist
description.delete_custom_list: Delete the entire selected custom playlist
description.show_custom_list: Show all songs in a single custom playlist

params_desc.play_query: Enter a song name, YouTube link, or playlist
params_desc.add_query: Enter the name of the song or YouTube link to add
params_desc.remove_number: The number of the song to remove (viewable from /queue)
params_desc.volume_volume: Set the volume (0-200), or use the buttons to fine-tune
params_desc.add_custom_list_list_name: To create a new playlist, simply enter the desired playlist name.

components.send_play_not_in_voice: You don't seem to be in a voice channel? Join one first
components.send_play_no_query: I didn't receive your keyword... Remember to enter `query`
components.send_play_error: Huh? Something seems to have gone wrong, why not try a different `query`?
components.send_add_not_in_voice: You don't seem to be in a voice channel? Join one first
components.send_add_not_in_same_channel: You and I are not in the same channel... Join {channel_mention} first
components.send_add_player_crashed: YinXi seems to have exited abnormally just now... Why not let me rejoin and see?
components.send_add_success: Successfully added the song to the playlist! You now have {size} songs in your playlist!
components.send_skip_no_more_songs: Add a song first~ There are no more songs in the playlist
components.send_back_no_more_songs: Add a song first~ There are no more songs in the playlist
components.send_stop_not_in_voice: Huh? Are you or am I not in a voice channel
components.send_stop_not_in_same_channel: Huh? We seem to be in different channels
components.send_stop_success: Music has been stopped and I have left {channel_mention}~
components.send_loop_invalid_type:
You gave me the wrong loop type, available loop types are `{loop_option_str}`
Try again~
components.send_loop_success: Loop mode has been set to `{loop_type}`

embed_clear_confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist?

components.send_lyrics_not_found: Couldn't find the lyrics for this song... Maybe try a different keyword?
components.send_lyrics_too_short_tip: If the lyrics look too short, you can try setting `lrc` to `True`~
components.send_check_not_in_voice: You need to join a voice channel first!
components.send_button_not_in_voice: You don't seem to be in a voice channel?
components.send_button_bot_not_in_voice: YinXi is not in a voice channel :thinking:
components.send_button_player_crashed: YinXi seems to have crashed unexpectedly :thinking:
components.send_button_stopped_music: ( {user} ) has stopped the music and left {channel_mention} ~
components.send_button_loop_changed: Loop status has been changed to `{loop_status}`
components.send_button_recommend_not_enabled: You haven't enabled music recommendations, please use `/music_recommendation` to enable this feature!
components.send_button_no_recommendations: There are no recommended songs for you at the moment.
components.send_check_bot_not_in_voice: I'm not in any voice channel right now

embed_player_queue.title: Playlist
embed_player_queue.description: There are currently `{count}` songs in total

components.send_player_play_error:
Playback failed, possibly because you've been playing for too long, causing the audio link to expire, or for other reasons. It is recommended to use `/remove` to delete the song and then add it again.
(Reason: {e})
(If you are unsure of the reason, you can use `/report` to report it.)
components.send_player_not_playing: There is no music playing right now
components.send_player_paused_success: I've paused the music for you
components.send_player_is_playing: YinXi is currently playing, no need to resume :thinking:
components.send_player_not_paused: There is no paused music here
components.send_player_resumed_success: I've resumed the music for you~
components.send_player_playlist_empty: The playlist is empty, cannot play the next song
components.send_player_finished_playlist: I've finished playing all the songs! I'm leaving now
components.send_player_lyrics_not_found: No search results found, it is recommended to use `/lyrics {query} {artist}` to search for lyrics
components.send_add_to_custom_list_success: Successfully added song to custom playlist `({list_name})`.
components.send_delete_custom_list_cancelled: Deletion of custom playlist `({list_name})` has been cancelled.
components.send_play_custom_list_already_playing_le: You must leave first before you can play your custom playlist.
components.send_play_not_in_guild: You must be in a guild to play music.
